data.title: Andhra University Examination Computerization System & Certificate Genuineness Verification
data.text:
The Candidates who wish to apply for Original Degree Certificates, Provisional Certificates, Individual Marks Memos, Consolidated Marks Memos, Migration Certificate, Rank Certificates, Revaluation Marks Memos, Genuineness Certificates and other relevant Certificates from Andhra University shall apply by paying the prescribed fees through Online mode for Undergraduate, Postgraduate and Professional Courses from below link.

Mandatory: Maintain high speed internet connection while applying for certificates. slow internet connection may responsible for transaction failure.
